displayName.english: You're not here for the money?

displayName.dutch: Je bent hier niet voor het geld?
displayName.brazilian: Você não está aqui pelo dinheiro?

description.english: Exorcise an entity without entering any evidence.
description.french: Exorciser le fantome sans avoir de preuve.
description.schinese: 不用任何证据驱除鬼魂。
description.russian: Изгнать сущность без ввода каких-либо улик.
description.portuguese: Exorcise uma entidade sem marcar qualquer evidência.
description.dutch: Verdrijf een entiteit zonder het bewijs in te vullen.
description.czech: Vymiť entitu bez zadání žádného důkazu-
description.brazilian: Exorcise uma entidade sem marcar qualquer evidência.

description.english: Exorcise your first supernatural entity.
description.french: Exorciser une entité surnaturelle.
description.dutch: Verdrijf je eerste bovennatuurlijke entiteit.

description.english: Exorcise 50 supernatural entities.
description.french: Exorciser 50 entités surnaturelles.
description.dutch: Verdrijf 50 bovennatuurlijke entiteiten.

description.english: Exorcise 100 supernatural entities.
description.french: Exorciser 100 entités surnaturelles.
description.dutch: Verdrijf 100 supernnatuurlijke entiteiten.

description.english: In Normal, Hard or Rescue, correctly fill out the Ghostpedia, but safely return to the Hub without completing the exorcism.
description.french: En Normal, Difficile ou Rescue, remplir le Ghostpedia correctement mais rentrer sans faire l'exorcisme.
description.czech: V Normální, Těžké nebo Záchraně, správně vyplň Duchopedii, ale bezpečně se vrať do Hubu bez dokončení exorcismu.
description.dutch: In Normaal, Moeilijk of Redding, vul alles correct in de Geestenpedia, maar kom velig terug na de basis zonder the verdrijfing compleet af te maken.
description.russian: В нормальном, сложном или спасательном режимах правильно заполните Призракпедиа, но благополучно вернитесь в хаб, не завершая экзорцизм.
description.schinese: 在普通、困难或救援中，正确填写鬼魂百科，而未完成驱除仪式的情况下安全返回中心。
description.brazilian: No modo Normal, Difícil ou Resgate, preencha corretamente o Ghostpedia, porém retorne com segurança ao Hub sem completar o exorcismo.
description.portuguese: No modo Normal, Difícil ou Resgate, preencha corretamente o Ghostpedia, porém retorne com segurança ao Hub sem completar o exorcismo.

description.english: Buy 20 Neutrino-Guns.
description.french: Acheter 20 Neutrino-Gun.
description.dutch: Koop 20 Neutrino-Geweren.

description.english: Encounter and exorcise more than one entity during a mission that is not Multi-Entity.
description.french: Rencontrez et exorcisez plus d'une entité au cours d'une mission qui n'est pas de type Multi-Entités.
description.czech: Setkej se a vymiť více jak jednu entitu v misi, co není Vícero Entit.
description.dutch: Ontmoet en verdrijf meer dan één entiteit in een missie dat niet Meerder-Entiteiten is.
description.russian: Встретьте и изгоните более одной сущности во время миссии, которая не является Мультисущностью.
description.schinese: 在鬼魅成群模式之外遇到并驱除一个以上的鬼魂。
description.brazilian: Encontre e exorcise mais de uma entidade durante uma missão que não seja Multi Entidades.
description.portuguese: Encontre e exorcise mais de uma entidade durante uma missão que não seja Multi Entidades.

description.english: Exorcise at least 2 entities during a Multi-Entity Contract.
description.french: Exorcisez les 2 entités pendant un contrat Multi-Entités.
description.czech: Vymiť alespoň 2 entity během kontraktu Vícero Entit.
description.dutch: Verdrijf op zijn minst 2 entiteiten gedurende een Meerdere-Entiteiten Contract.
description.russian: Изгоните не менее 2 сущностей во время мульти-контракта.
description.schinese: 在鬼魅成群合约中驱除多个鬼魂。
description.brazilian: Exorcise pelo menos 2 entidades durante um contrato Multi Entidades
description.portuguese: Exorcise pelo menos 2 entidades durante um contrato Multi Entidades

displayName.english: We told you not to turn off the light!

displayName.portuguese: Dissemos para você não apagar a luz!
